response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a valuable asset that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its true worth and your perceived value, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I trust this proposal will resonate with your interests and needs. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
